org.funcito.functorfactory

Class FunctorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.funcito.functorfactory.FunctorFactory

  • public class FunctorFactory
extends Object
    Used by the constructors of the Funcito wrapper-classes for each 3rd party functor class

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        public static FunctorFactory instance()
        Retrieves the singleton FunctorFactory

      • makeFunctionalBase

        public <T,V> FunctorBase<T,V> makeFunctionalBase(InvokableState state,
                                        TypedMode<V> mode)
        Factory method for functors which use a TypedMode
        Type Parameters:
        T - the target (input) type of the resulting FunctorBase
        V - the resulting (output) type of the resulting FunctorBase
        Parameters:
        state - the captured and extracted invokable state to be transformed into a FunctorBase
        mode - the TypedMode that determines how the FunctorBase will behave
        Returns:
        a FunctorBase that will execute/replay the captured InvokableState of method calls

      • makeFunctionalBase

        public <T,V> FunctorBase<T,V> makeFunctionalBase(InvokableState state,
                                        Mode mode)
        Factory method for functors which use an untyped Mode
        Type Parameters:
        T - the target (input) type of the resulting FunctorBase
        V - the resulting (output) type of the resulting FunctorBase
        Parameters:
        state - the captured and extracted invokable state to be transformed into a FunctorBase
        mode - the untyped Mode that determines how the FunctorBase will behave
        Returns:
        a FunctorBase that will execute/replay the captured InvokableState of method calls
